Articles.Content:
Posting here as well as on the SAP-C page because why not.

The Monument is SAP-C's latest addition to their fleet, and its cute! (As long as it doesn't have that Horus in it's mouth.) I got inspired to make a space warship when I waas rewatching Kethane Station, it weighs 69.3 tons and has 256 parts, it has two mini-LFOX missiles stacked on either side, two recycled posterus missiles on the "eyes" and a big 1.25m Horus missile in it's "mouth" at first, with the Horus is will creep enemies out, when it's gone it will distract them with it's cuteness! (Since the shielded docking port has no attatchment nodes, the Horus is attatched onto a cubic strut at first, so decouple node on the first Horus, after reloading it should be fine.) It has four Ion engines and three Nerva engines, allowing it interplanetary A.K.A slow travel, and propulsion and DV when orbiting a plaanet wth the Nerva's. Thanks for looking, here she is.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
